name: Unfounded
description:
Pit yourself against a murderous ghost as you search your way through an abandoned complex. Gather the evidence and make your escape.

Key Features

Gorgeous low-poly art style

Mature audience

Atmospheric

Easy to play

Social Media

Install Instructions

1. Download and unzip Unfounded.zip

2. Launch Unfounded.exe
